articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Sri Lanka, Bangladesh Register Big Wins To Enter Semifinals Of Women's Asia Cup - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Hosts Sri Lanka and Bangladesh cruised into the semifinals of the women's Asia Cup T20 tournament with comfortable victories over Thailand and Malaysia in Dambulla on Wednesday.
articles.content: Hosts Sri Lanka and Bangladesh cruised into the semifinals of the women's Asia Cup T20 tournament with comfortable victories over Thailand and Malaysia in Dambulla on Wednesday. While Sri Lanka thras… [+1464 chars]
